RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 10. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONORABLE away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under mild urging to win as much the best. LOOKS GOOD N A TUX never far back, moved up three wide into the far turn then was no match for the winner while second best. KING ANDRES pressured the winner two wide, dropped inside on the far turn then was outfinished. GEH SCHNELL went evenly. GOTSOMEMOJO was no threat. GET HAMMERED pressed the pace into the far turn and was through after six furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: even effort

ENTRY.NAME: Gotsomemojo
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Get Hammered
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, through after six furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Honorable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, angled in 2nd turn, outfinished inside

ENTRY.NAME: Looks Good N a Tux
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3-2wide, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANCHORWOMAN sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set the early pace under pressured, shook clear before the turn then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while under a strong hand ride through the final sixteenth of a mile. DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT pressured the winner along the inside early, chased that one into the stretch then was no match while well clear for second. DEE'S KY WILDCAT trailed into the turn then passed tiring rivals in the six path. OUTPOST GIRL was fractious in the post parade and the starting gate, hustled away from the start, moved closer to the leaders two wide on the turn then faltered. LIVIE ANNE was no threat. APPALACHIAN SPIRIT had brief speed. TWILIGHT BEAUTY had speed into the turn then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Dominique's Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, no match for winner, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Anchorwoman
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pressured pace, drew off, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStarFarm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Ky Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Appalachian Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Clark Rick Clark Brent W Wolfe Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Outpost Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious post parade, gate, middle move 2w, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Livie Anne
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIACOMETTI matched strides for the lead four then two wide into the stretch then drew off at will under a strong hand ride to win as much the best. OUTSLEWTHEM battled for the early lead two wide, bumped with a rival to his inside entering the turn, dropped back a bit then came on again two wide through the stretch to finish clear for second. WARHORSE WEST contested the lead three wide then along the inside into the stretch and was outfinished. TWELVE MINUS ONE unhurried early, swung wide and had a mild late rally in the middle of the racetrack. LITTLE VAQUERO broke awkwardly and was no threat. ATILANO vied for the early lead along the rail, was bumped entering the turn causing his rider to steady then dropped out of it. ELUSIVE QUESTION close up five wide from the start, improved position on the turn then faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Vaquero
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Atilano
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied rail, bumped 7/16pole, steadied, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Outslewthem
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2wide, bumped past 7/16pole, came again, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Warhorse West
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested 3 wide, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Giacometti
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 4-2wide, full of run, much the best, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, mild rally mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive Question
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 5 wide, improved position turn, faltered,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 10. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VINTAGE SPARKLE allowed to settle, saved ground into the stretch, altered course outside the top pair, responded with a burst of speed through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. DARK TEMPTRESS vied for the lead through the turn, rallied two wide under left handed urging to make the lead near the furlong marker and just missed hanging on. SOME WOULD SAY away alertly, set the pace into the stretch then was outfinished. GALILEO'S AFFAIR went evenly. ROMANTIC JEWEL was hustled along, chased the pace along the inside into the stretch, altered course to the five path then weakened. KENNEDIE SKY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage Sparkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed with a rush, 3 wide, up in final stride

ENTRY.NAME: Some Would Say
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kennedie Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Temptress
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, rallied 2 wide, left urging, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Galileo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: V K STAR never far back, lacked racing room behind rivals past the furlong marker, altered course four wide at the sixteenth pole, surged under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. MARIMBA vied for the lead three wide into the stretch, dug in late and just missed. LOTTA MOSCATO battled for the lead two wide into the turn, gained a narrow advantage, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished in a game effort. V K PRINCESS trailed into the stretch and had a mild late rally in the five path. HOPS PETUNIA battled for the lead along the rail into the stretch and faded late. OLIVIA'S JOY failed to menace. DAYS REMEMBERED close up early four wide, failed to respond. THE RIDER OF MARIMBA LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF V K START FOR ALLEGED INTEFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Hops Petunia
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Lotta Moscato
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, narrow lead, outfinished gamely

ENTRY.NAME: V K Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, altered course 4 wide 1/16pole, surged, in time,

ENTRY.NAME: V K Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild rally late 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Marimba
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, dug in late, just missed, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Days Remembered
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Olivia's Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 15600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELIEVING made the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, responded under right handed urging and finished full of run to win going away. TIME FOR CUPID stalked the pace into the stretch, dug in late in the four path and got up for second. YEARS AGO rushed up along the inside soon after the start to pressure the winner briefly, shifted out to the five path near the half mile pole, chased the pace into the stretch, dropped back towards the rail and was outfinished for second. TALK DIRTY close up from the start, swung wide and finished evenly. HALOFIED failed to menace. SKY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Years Ago
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, altered course 5path 1/2pole, chased, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, dug in 4path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Dirty
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, swung wide, even finished

ENTRY.NAME: Believing
ENTRY.OWNER: Kuntz Mark D and Dalton Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Halofied
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 10 Allowed 2 l bs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SQUID stalked the early pace, responded readily when set down, rallied three wide under right handed urging to make the lead near mid stretch and drew clear. FLOWZANO pressed the early pace two wide, gained a narrow lead, set the pace until mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner but gamely held on for second. POLISHED GEM broke in front, set the early pace along the inside, gave up a narrow advantage, prompted the pace the balance of the trip and was outfinished. SOMUCHSUGAR never far back, finished with good courage four wide. MON PARADIS trailed into the stretch and found her best stride late three wide. RAINBOW SHIP vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch and faded late. CAUSE OF LOVE was no threat. GRAN MAMIBELLA close up early, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Flowzano
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Somuchsugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Rainbow Ship
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Cause of Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Paradis
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Polished Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set early pace, kept on, outfinished rail

ENTRY.NAME: Squid
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, right handed urging, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 10 Al lowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SORORITY SISTER sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch and prevailed under brisk handling. NEECHI chased the early pace three wide, loomed boldly three wide nearing the quarter pole and finished second best. TRULY INCLUSIVE had a mild late rally. APPEALING SENORITA unhurried early, found her best stride late. BROWNIE well placed, failed to respond. HELLO SWEETS failed to menace. DANZA MAGIC passed tiring rivals. BAY MAGIC pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then gave way readily. MISS ELLIE close up near the inside, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Danza Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Bay Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sorority Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, drew clear,left handed urging

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Sweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Truly Inclusive
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late

ENTRY.NAME: Neechi
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, loomed boldly 3 wide turn, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Brownie
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,
